name: Homunculus
lore: A homunculus is a construct made of organic materials, given a semblance of life through an alchemical process. It serves as a faithful companion and spy, sharing a telepathic bond with its creator. If its creator dies, the homunculus also dies.

languages.notes: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

traits.name: Telepathic Bond
traits.description: While the homunculus and its creator are on the same plane of existence, the creator can communicate with the homunculus telepathically, and the creator can perceive through the homunculus's senses.

actions.name: Bite
actions.description: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw or have the Poisoned condition for 1 minute. The target repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

savingThrow.targets: the target at the end of each of its turns

onSuccess.effects: The effect ends on the target.
